anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr3558 [Yumemakura Baku]`s novel series. Ootori Kou is a normal high school student who experiences a repeating dream of being eaten by a beast from inside himself. When Kou meets Kuki Reiichi, the elite student who rules his school, the encounter awakens hidden powers inside him. Source: ANN
